title: Chifan Shuijiao Da Dou Dou
synopsis: The story of the animation originated from the innovative continuation of the internet hot joke "Eat, Sleep and Beat Doudou". It tells the hilarious funny stories of cute and cute Soybeans appearing mysteriously in Antarctica and a group of unique penguin friends. The cute and cute Doudou has a strong curiosity and seems to have endless energy, but because of his cuteness by nature, he often does things that make people laugh. (translated from bilibili)

Sequel.name: Chifan Shuijiao Da Dou Dou Dou Te Me Hei
